channel.title: Recommends on Thomas Maintenance
channel.description: Recent content in Recommends on Thomas Maintenance

item.title: What Others are saying...
item.description: “We have been using TMi for 20 years with great success, I highly recommend their services based on quality of work and their ability to work in a team environment.” Tyler Patroch, Director of Course and Grounds. Point Grey Golf Course, Vancouver “We have enjoyed working with TMi since 1990. Always pleased with their team’s attention to detail and excellent communication.” Bunny Porteous, Senior Property Manager First Services Residential “Highly Recommend your firm for going the extra mile.
